audioJson.name: Dictabelt
audioJson.capacity:
Standard speed: 15 minutes
Half speed: 30 minutes
audioJson.fact1: This format was more convenient and had better audio quality than reusable wax cylinders
audioJson.fact2: This format could be folded and fit into a standard letter-sized envelope
audioJson.fact3: Dictabelts were red until 1964, blue from 1964 to 1975, then purple until they were discontinued
